[{"version":"7.12.1","type":"visualization","gridData":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":48,"h":15,"i":"7b394b78-9c63-49c2-9140-54bb327316aa"},"panelIndex":"7b394b78-9c63-49c2-9140-54bb327316aa","embeddableConfig":{"savedVis":{"title":"","description":"","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":12,"openLinksInNewTab":false,"markdown":"# A dashboard to monitor activites

This dashboard shows the activities sent from Kafka enriched with 3 metrics :
* the number of IP addresses registered every 10 minutes, 
* the mean reaction time of users registered every 10 minutes, 
* the number of clicks of users registered every 10 minutes.

You can see the evolution of the CTR from a specific and customizable time window, the TOP IP/UID with the most events/clicks or the highest reaction time. 

Use the control panel to filter activities.

The time window (of 10 minutes) used to compute these metrics cannot be changed from the dashboard since it is calculated before being sent to Elasticsearch. However, one can edit the time window used to compute the CTR or to aggregate UID/IP together directly from the visualisation. You can also change the time range of activities from the "calendar" on the top-right corner of the dashboard."},"uiState":{},"data":{"aggs":[],"searchSource":{"query":{"query":"","language":"kuery"},"filter":[]}}},"enhancements":{},"hidePanelTitles":false},"title":"README"},{"version":"7.12.1","type":"visualization","gridData":{"x":0,"y":15,"w":10,"h":16,"i":"a1c886ba-8d6f-4e4b-bfe9-ccbb999067e0"},"panelIndex":"a1c886ba-8d6f-4e4b-bfe9-ccbb999067e0","embeddableConfig":{"savedVis":{"title":"","description":"","type":"input_control_vis","params":{"controls":[{"id":"1625143328316","indexPattern":"cb792420-da68-11eb-b00b-7f123b565cc6","fieldName":"numIpByUid","parent":"","label":"Number
